effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 375,182 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 175,585.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cursed Vision of Sargeras

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: When you enter combat, gain 1 Dormant Gemstone per socketed gem.

Whenever you heal an ally, bestow upon them 1 Empowered Gemstone to increase the potency of one of their socketed gems by 141 for 20 sec. When their gemstone becomes dormant, it is returned to you.

spells.description: Use: Draw out a piece of the target's soul, decreasing their movement speed by 30% until the soul reaches you. The soul instantly heals you for 477,034, and grants you up to 10,293 Critical Strike for 16 sec. You gain more Critical Strike from lower health targets. (2 Min Cooldown)
Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 588,813 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: You champion the cause of Gilneas.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
